name: MIR3
overview:
MIR3, Inc. provides automated Intelligent Notification solutions for global and enterprise-wide communications and business continuity. Its products are built on a geo-dispersed, telephony, and application server platform that directs the dissemination of time-urgent information to and from communications devices in a communication medium. The companyâ€™s products include inEnterprise, which monitors alerts initiated from information technology infrastructure; and inTechCenter that integrates with the system monitoring components of an enterprise infrastructure. It serves government, transportation, finance, energy and utilities, healthcare, education, emergency response, and gaming markets.

The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in San Diego, California with an additional office in London.

milestones.description: MIR3 and Sydion Announce Partnership to Bring Leading Notification and Inventory Tracking to Emergency Responders
milestones.source_description: MIR3 and Sydion Announce Partnership to Bring Leading Notification and Inventory Tracking to Emergency Responders
